para.1: Kugirango tugere ku ntera nyayo mubuzima bwacu bwumwuka tuzi ko dukeneye isoko yizewe yubwenge.
para.2: Kanda kumashusho hepfo bizagutangira munzira yo kuvumbura ubwenge bwiteka Imana ishaka ko umenya kandi ukurikiza.

para.1: Iyi nkuru itangirana nigihe mbere yuko habaho abantu. Hanyuma iravuga inkuru yukuntu abantu babiri ba mbere basabana nImana. ",
para.2: Koranya inshuti zawe hanyuma usome uburyo Imana yateguye abantu ukuza kwa Yesu n'Ubwenge bwayo.
para.3: Hitamo ururimi ukunda ukanze kwisi yose hejuru.

para.1: Ibi ni bimwe mubintu Yesu n'abayoboke be ba mbere bigishije.
para.2: Abantu benshi babonye ubuzima bwabo bwahindutse mugihe basabye Yesu kubaha imbaraga zo gushyira izi nyigisho mubikorwa.
para.3: Kusanya inshuti zawe urebe ibyo wavumbuye mugihe muganira kubibazo bikurikira.
para.4: Hitamo ururimi ukunda ukanze kwisi yose hejuru.

para.1: Yesu ni isoko y'ubwenge bw'iteka. Mugihe ureba videwo, ibaze ubwawe "Yesu yakoze iki kandi yigisha? Ubwenge bwe butandukaniye he nibyo abandi bavuze."
para.2: Iyi videwo iraboneka mu ndimi nyinshi. Guhindura imvugo kanda isi yisi hejuru.
